summary: Oakland is a city in California's San Francisco Bay Area. It's a big port city and the most populous in the East Bay region. Oakland was incorporated in 1852 during the California gold rush. It was once covered in prairies, oak woodlands, and coastal scrub. The city grew with the logging industry and agriculture. It became a major hub with the Transcontinental Railroad and Lake Merritt, the first wildlife refuge in the U.S. Oakland expanded after the 1906 San Francisco earthquake. Recently, it lost three major league sports teams due to financial disputes.
title: Oakland, California
